name: Notice.AAA6.CP.SDOMadebyLA.Claimant
titleEn: An order has been made on this claim
titleCy: Mae gorchymyn wedi'i wneud ar yr hawliad hwn
descriptionEn: You need to carefully read and review this order. If you don't agree with something in the order you can ask the court to review it. You can only do this once. You will have to provide details about what changes you want made and these will be reviewed by a judge. This must be done before ${requestForReconsiderationDeadlineEn}.
descriptionCy: Mae angen i chi ddarllen ac adolygu'r gorchymyn hwn yn ofalus. Os nad ydych yn cytuno Ã¢ rhywbeth yn y gorchymyn, gallwch ofyn i'r llys ei adolygu. Dim ond unwaith y gallwch wneud hyn. Bydd yn rhaid i chi roi manylion am y newidiadau rydych eisiau gweld yn cael eu gwneud a bydd y rhain yn cael eu hadolygu gan farnwr. Rhaid gwneud hyn cyn ${requestForReconsiderationDeadlineCy}.
